subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Horseplayers and horse lovers can take heart that the camps of Shackleford and Animal Kingdom have indicated they would like a rubber match at the 143rd running of the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Horseplayers and horse lovers can take heart that the camps of Shackleford and Animal Kingdom have indicated they would like a rubber match at the 143rd running of the Belmont Stakes.
